name: Spike Spike
description:
Jump around, reach the exit, and avoid the dangerous spikes.

Entry for Low-Tier Jam

Made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5

Update 01

- Red Coins, they are worth 10 coins.

-Coin counter.

-New ending (Get it by collecting all of the 164 coins.)

-Auto Restart (You can still restart by pressing R)

-Bug fixes
